card.name: All Is Dust
card.text: Each player sacrifices all colored permanents he or she controls.

card.text: Look at the top five cards of your library. You may reveal a colorless card from among them and put it into your hand. Then put the rest on the bottom of your library in any order.

card.name: Angelheart Vial
card.text: Whenever you're dealt damage, you may put that many charge counters on Angelheart Vial. {2}, {T}, Remove four charge counters from Angelheart Vial: You gain 2 life and draw a card.

card.text: Annihilator 1 {4}: Put two 0/1 colorless Eldrazi Spawn creature tokens onto the battlefield. They have "Sacrifice this creature: Add {C} to your mana pool." {20}: Cast any number of Eldrazi cards you own from outside the game without paying their mana costs.

card.name: Sphinx of Magosi
card.text: Flying {2}{U}: Draw a card, then put a +1/+1 counter on Sphinx of Magosi.

card.name: Sphinx-Bone Wand
card.text: Whenever you cast an instant or sorcery spell, you may put a charge counter on Sphinx-Bone Wand. If you do, Sphinx-Bone Wand deals damage equal to the number of charge counters on it to target creature or player.

card.name: Spider Umbra
card.text: Enchant creature Enchanted creature gets +1/+1 and has reach. Totem armor

card.name: Splinter Twin
card.text: Enchant creature Enchanted creature has "{T}: Put a token that's a copy of this creature onto the battlefield. That token has haste. Exile it at the beginning of the next end step."

card.name: Staggershock
card.text: Staggershock deals 2 damage to target creature or player. Rebound

card.name: Stalwart Shield-Bearers
card.text: Defender Other creatures you control with defender get +0/+2.

card.name: Student of Warfare
card.text: Level up {W} LEVEL 2-6 3/3 First strike LEVEL 7+ 4/4 Double strike

card.name: Suffer the Past
card.text: Exile X target cards from target player's graveyard. For each card exiled this way, that player loses 1 life and you gain 1 life.

card.name: Surrakar Spellblade
card.text: Whenever you cast an instant or sorcery spell, you may put a charge counter on Surrakar Spellblade. Whenever Surrakar Spellblade deals combat damage to a player, you may draw X cards, where X is the number of charge counters on it.

card.name: Surreal Memoir
card.text: Return an instant card at random from your graveyard to your hand. Rebound

card.name: Survival Cache
card.text: You gain 2 life. Then if you have more life than an opponent, draw a card. Rebound

card.name: Tajuru Preserver
card.text: Spells and abilities your opponents control can't cause you to sacrifice permanents.

card.name: Thought Gorger
card.text: Trample When Thought Gorger enters the battlefield, put a +1/+1 counter on it for each card in your hand. If you do, discard your hand. When Thought Gorger leaves the battlefield, draw a card for each +1/+1 counter on it.

card.name: Time of Heroes
card.text: Each creature you control with a level counter on it gets +2/+2.

card.name: Totem-Guide Hartebeest
card.text: When Totem-Guide Hartebeest enters the battlefield, you may search your library for an Aura card, reveal it, put it into your hand, then shuffle your library.

card.name: Training Grounds
card.text: Activated abilities of creatures you control cost up to {2} less to activate. This effect can't reduce the amount of mana an ability costs to activate to less than one mana.

card.name: Traitorous Instinct
card.text: Gain control of target creature until end of turn. Untap that creature. Until end of turn, it gets +2/+0 and gains haste.

card.name: Transcendent Master
card.text: Level up {1} LEVEL 6-11 6/6 Lifelink LEVEL 12+ 9/9 Lifelink, indestructible

card.name: Tuktuk the Explorer
card.text: Haste When Tuktuk the Explorer dies, put a legendary 5/5 colorless Goblin Golem artifact creature token named Tuktuk the Returned onto the battlefield.

card.name: Ulamog, the Infinite Gyre
card.text: When you cast Ulamog, the Infinite Gyre, destroy target permanent. Indestructible Annihilator 4 When Ulamog is put into a graveyard from anywhere, its owner shuffles his or her graveyard into his or her library.

card.name: Ulamog's Crusher
card.text: Annihilator 2 Ulamog's Crusher attacks each turn if able.

card.name: Umbra Mystic
card.text: Auras attached to permanents you control have totem armor.

card.name: Unified Will
card.text: Counter target spell if you control more creatures than that spell's controller.

card.name: Valakut Fireboar
card.text: Whenever Valakut Fireboar attacks, switch its power and toughness until end of turn.

card.name: Vendetta
card.text: Destroy target nonblack creature. It can't be regenerated. You lose life equal to that creature's toughness.

card.name: Venerated Teacher
card.text: When Venerated Teacher enters the battlefield, put two level counters on each creature you control with level up.

card.name: Vengevine
card.text: Haste Whenever you cast a spell, if it's the second creature spell you cast this turn, you may return Vengevine from your graveyard to the battlefield.

card.name: Vent Sentinel
card.text: Defender {1}{R}, {T}: Vent Sentinel deals damage to target player equal to the number of creatures with defender you control.

card.name: Virulent Swipe
card.text: Target creature gets +2/+0 and gains deathtouch until end of turn. Rebound

card.name: Wall of Omens
card.text: Defender When Wall of Omens enters the battlefield, draw a card.

card.name: Warmonger's Chariot
Wildheart Invoker
card.text: {8}: Target creature gets +5/+5 and gains trample until end of turn.

card.name: World at War
card.text: After the first postcombat main phase this turn, there's an additional combat phase followed by an additional main phase. At the beginning of that combat, untap all creatures that attacked this turn. Rebound

card.name: Wrap in Flames
card.text: Wrap in Flames deals 1 damage to each of up to three target creatures. Those creatures can't block this turn.

card.name: Zof Shade
card.text: {2}{B}: Zof Shade gets +2/+2 until end of turn.

card.name: Zulaport Enforcer
card.text: Level up {4} LEVEL 1-2 3/3 LEVEL 3+ 5/5 Zulaport Enforcer can't be blocked except by black creatures.
